c.UIL-MEDIUM-ICON-TOGGLE-BUTTON.ua.LABEL: Enable User Menu Choices for UILTDLG
c.UIL-MEDIUM-ICON-TOGGLE-BUTTON.ua.TOGGLELABEL: Enable User Menu Choices for UILTDLG

g2:Structure.g2:sa.UIL-BUTTON-LABEL-VALUE: Enable User Menu Choices for UILTDLG

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: CLONE.
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start guide-clone-tab-page (the uil-tab-page that is the-tab-page-handled-by-the-tab-button the item, this window)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: ENABLE.
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is true and the state of the item is disabled
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: for any uil-tab-page B that is the-tab-page-handled-by-the-tab-button the item unconditionally in order start uil-enable-grobj-method (the item) and start uil-enable-grobj-method (B)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: DISABLE.
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is true and the state of the item is enabled
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: for any uil-tab-page B that is the-tab-page-handled-by-the-tab-button the item unconditionally in order start uil-disable-grobj-method (the item) and start uil-disable-grobj-method (B)

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: initially deactivate the subworkspace of tab-guide-clone-rules
whenever any uil-message I is moved by the user and when I is not a uil-tab-page then start upp-adjust-tab-page-contents-list-if-appropriate (I)
whenever any uil-object I is moved by the user and when I is not a uil-tab-pushbutton then start upp-adjust-tab-page-contents-list-if-appropriate (I)
whenever the uil-tab-page-button-placement of any uil-tab-dialog D receives a value then start upp-move-tab-pages (D)
whenever any uil-tab-pushbutton B is moved by the user and when there exists a uil-tab-page P that is the-tab-page-handled-by-the-tab-button B then start upp-tab-page-movement-adjustments (P)
whenever any uil-tab-page P is moved by the user then start upp-move-tab-page (P)

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT: _uiltdlg-toggle-user-menu-choices (B: class uil-button, W: class item, D-or-W: class item) begin if (the toggle-state of B is on) then conclude that uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is true else conclude that uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is false; end

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: ENABLE.
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is true and the state of the item is disabled
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: for any uil-tab-pushbutton B that is the-tab-button-of-the-tab-page the item unconditionally in order start uil-enable-grobj-method (the item) and start uil-enable-grobj-method (B)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: DISABLE.
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: uiltdlg-user-menu-choices-active is true and the state of the item is enabled
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: for any uil-tab-pushbutton B that is the-tab-button-of-the-tab-page the item unconditionally in order start uil-disable-grobj-method (the item) and start uil-disable-grobj-method (B)

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT: upp-rotate-tab-pushbuttons (ITM: class item, W: class ui-client-item) D: item-or-value; begin if (ITM is a uil-tab-page or ITM is a uil-tab-pushbutton) and (the workspace of ITM exists and the item D superior to the workspace of ITM exists and D is a uil-dialog) then begin if (the uil-tab-page-button-placement of D = the symbol top) then conclude that the uil-tab-page-button-placement of D = the symbol right else if (the uil-tab-page-button-placement of D = the symbol right) then conclude that the uil-tab-page-button-placement of D = the symbol left else conclude that the uil-tab-page-button-placement of D = the symbol top; end; end

upp-delete-tab-pushbutton-method (B : class uil-tab-pushbutton) page : class uil-tab-page; begin if there exists a uil-tab-page page that is the-tab-page-handled-by-the-tab-button B then call uil-delete-grobj-method (page) else call upp-delete-item (B); end

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: whenever the uil-is-managed of any uil-object O receives a value then start upp-adjust-tab-page-contents-list-if-appropriate (O)
whenever the uil-is-managed of any uil-message O receives a value then start upp-adjust-tab-page-contents-list-if-appropriate (O)

c.PROTOOLS-CHANGE-MESSAGE.g2:a.TEXT: Deleted Regions (symbol array) to fix leak
Deleted Regions (symbol array) in 2 places to fix leak
